publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4548 Aileen Campbell: Irvine Man Wins JoLoMo Award for Scottish Landscape Painting—That the Parliament congratulates Keith Salmon of Irvine on his victory in this year’s JoLoMo award for Scottish landscape painting; notes that his mysterious and beautiful landscapes were chosen unanimously by judges, beating competition from professional artists across Scotland; recognises that his victory in spite of his blindness is an inspiration for aspiring artists; believes that Scotland’s beautiful scenery can provide visual inspiration for artists all over the world, and wishes Mr Salmon the best of luck in fulfilling his dream of becoming a full-time artist. Supported by: Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Anne McLaughlin, Bob Doris, Jamie McGrigor, Sandra White
